Package org.water.bluetooth.application.executor.connection

Class RemoteConnection

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
org.water.bluetooth.application.executor.connection.RemoteConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class RemoteConnection extends Thread
The RemoteConnection class represents a thread handling an incoming Bluetooth connection request. This class extends Thread and is designed to be instantiated for each incoming connection.

The class includes methods for handling the Bluetooth connection, extracting data from the incoming stream, and performing HTTP POST requests for temperature, dissolved metals, and pH data to a server.

It uses the "config.properties" file located in the "src/main/resources" directory for configuration properties such as allowed devices and the current environment.

The class also includes methods for extracting details about dissolved metals and pH based on their values.

Since:
2023-12-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
gubbriaco, agrandinetti, fnicoletti

    • httpPostRequest

      private void httpPostRequest(String data) throws IOException, InterruptedException, IllegalArgumentException
      Performs an HTTP POST request for temperature, dissolved metals, and pH data to a server.
      Parameters:
      data - The data string containing values separated by commas and semicolons (e.g., "24.12, 4325, 7.8;").
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while making the HTTP POST request.
      InterruptedException - If the current thread is interrupted while waiting for the HTTP POST threads to complete.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided data string does not contain valid temperature, dissolved metals, or pH data.

    • getTemperature

      private String getTemperature(String data) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Extracts the temperature value from the provided data string.
      Parameters:
      data - The data string containing values separated by commas and semicolons (e.g., "24.12, 4325, 7.8;").
      Returns:
      The temperature value extracted from the data string.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided data string does not contain valid temperature data.

    • getDissolvedMetalsDetails

      private String getDissolvedMetalsDetails(String dissolvedMetalsString) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Determines the dissolved metals details based on the provided dissolved metals value.
      Parameters:
      dissolvedMetalsString - The dissolved metals value as a string.
      Returns:
      Details about the dissolved metals, such as water quality information.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided dissolved metals value is invalid or out of range.

    • getPhDetails

      private String getPhDetails(String pHString) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Determines the pH details based on the provided pH value.
      Parameters:
      pHString - The pH value as a string.
      Returns:
      Details about the pH, such as acidity or alkalinity, and equivalent substances.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided pH value is invalid or out of range.
